head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GANZ, HARRY SIDNEY

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GANZ, HARRY SIDNEY

block.p: GANZ-Harry Sidney. Beloved husband of Norma. Loving father of Leslie (Thomas) Manisero, Nancy (Mitchell) Steir, and the late Steven. Cherished grandfather of Stefanie, Max and Rachel. He will be greatly missed. Services today, 11:30 AM, ''Sinai Chapels,'' 162-05 Horace Harding Expressway, Fresh Meadows, New York.
